doc.name: SyntacticPort
doc.description: Represent ComponentPorts syntactically in SyntacticNodes. Ports in models that can be interpreted as input or output ports can be represented referentially by this object. The semantic information about direction is not retained in the reference but represented by the context of the reference in an input or output list in a SyntacticTerm. Multiports are split into series of SyntacticPorts. Bidirectional ports are split into pairs of SyntacticPorts.
doc.author: Chris Shaver
